overview: Packed with live performance footage, music videos, interviews, backstage clips and much more, this compilation celebrates Norwegian industrial band Zeromancer, whose unique blend of hard rock, techno and synth-pop led to international recognition. Documentaries follow the group on both their American and European tours. Songs include "Need You Like a Drug," "Neo Geisha," "Chrome Bitch," "Clone Your Lover," "Send Me an Angel" and more.
title: Zeromancer: Eurotrash
